data.name: Login_Validation

data.name: Service_ThirdRule
data.value: If there is no PNR # in the booking put in the Airline Confirmation Number.

data.name: Approved_IfYourBag
data.value: If your bag does not accompany you to your flight's end-point destination you must report it to the airline before reporting it to Blue Ribbon Bags. Undelivered bags must be reported to Blue Ribbon Bags within 24 hours of your flight landing. You may report the mishandled bag to us either by phone at

data.name: Approved_PleaseBeSure
data.value: Please be sure to retain the baggage tracking information (file reference/locator number) the airline provides you with when filing a lost baggage claim with them, as Blue Ribbon Bags will require this information to process your mishandled baggage report. Undelivered bags must be reported to Blue Ribbon Bags within 24 hours of your flight landing.

data.name: Approved_PleaseKeep
data.value: Please keep this service agreement number for your records as you will need it to report your mishandled bag to us in the event your baggage is not delivered.

data.name: Approved_Thank
data.value: Thank you very much for choosing Blue Ribbon Bags service for your baggage. Be assured, we will make this as simple as possible for you.

data.name: Approved_ThankYou
data.value: Thank you very much for your business and safe travels.

data.name: Approved_WeAreHere
data.value: We are here to help you 24/7 seven days a week. Travel safe and worry free!

data.name: Approved_WhatToDo

data.name: Home_Condition2
data.value: * Payouts are limited to 2 undelivered bags per person.

data.name: Home_Condition1
data.value: * Service Agreement Fee is per person. Satisfaction Guarantee Payment is per bag.

data.name: Home_ForOnly
data.value: FOR ONLY US$5, BRB WILL TRACK AND EXPEDITE THE RETURN OF YOUR UNDELIVERED BAGGAGE BY THE AIRLINE.

data.name: Home_More
data.value: More information? You always can be in touch by email:

data.name: Home_NoReceipts
data.value: No receipts for baggage contents are required to receive payment.

data.name: Home_Offers
data.value: Blue Ribbon Bags offers three levels of baggage service satisfaction guarantee:

data.name: Home_Pays
data.value: BRB pays US$1000, guaranteed, for each bag not delivered after 4 days missing.

data.name: MBR_Before
data.value: Predtým, než nahlásite Vašu stratenú batožinu BRB, musíte najprv informovať leteckú spoločnosť, že Vaša batožina nedorazila do konečnej destinácie Vášho letu. Letecká spoločnosť Vám poskytne informácie pre sledovanie, ktoré budete potrebovať na podanie správy o strate batožiny.

data.name: MBR_Note
data.value: V rámci procesu podania správy o zle doručenej batožine ste povinní poskytnúť kópiu správy, ktorú vám poskytla letecká spoločnosť keď ste jej nahlásili stratu batožiny, spoločnosti Blue Ribbon Bags, do 24 hodín od pristátia vášho letu. Ak nepošlete kópiu správy poskytnutej leteckou spoločnosťou pri podaní sťažnosti ohľadom stratenej batožiny, do 24 hodín od pristátia vášho letu, vaša správa o zle doručenej batožine u Blue Ribbon Bags bude zamietnutá okamžite po uplynutí termínu 24 hodín a nebudete mať nárok na služby hľadania batožiny alebo našu platbu za záruku spokojnosti s poskytovaním služieb. Kópiu tejto správy zašlite na mbr@blueribbonbags.com a do predmetu uveďte číslo svojej zmluvy. Podporná dokumentácia leteckej spoločnosti, ktorá je predložená akýmkoľvek iným spôsobom, ako je tu uvedené, nebude považovaná za platné podanie a nebude zohľadnená v súvislosti s vašou správou o zle doručenej batožine spoločnosti Blue Ribbon Bags. Akékoľvek podania, ktoré nemajú sprievodnú dokumentáciu, budú po uplynutí 24-hodinovej lehoty odo momentu pristátia letu odmietnuté.

data.name: MBR_Undelivered
data.value: NEDORUČENÁ BATOŽINA, VRÁTANE PLATNÉHO REFERENČNÉHO ČÍSLA LETECKEJ SPOLOČNOSTI, MUSÍ BYŤ SPOLOČNOSTI BRB NAHLÁSENÁ DO 24 HODÍN OD PRÍLETU. SLUŽBA BRB NEBUDE POSKYTNUTÁ NA BATOŽINU NAHLÁSENÚ PO UPLYNUTÍ DOBY 24 HODÍN. AK VÁM LETECKÁ SPOLOČNOSŤ NEPOSKYTLA PLATNÉ REFERENČNÉ ČÍSLO, JE POTREBNÉ, ABY STE HO ZÍSKALI OD LETECKEJ SPOLOČNOSTI EŠTE PRED VYPLNENÍM NÁŠHO NAHLASOVACIEHO FORMULÁRA. BRB NEZÍSKAVA REFERENČNÉ ČÍSLO OD LETECKEJ SPOLOČNOSTI. PASAŽIER JE ZODPOVEDNÝ ZA ZÍSKANIE TOHTO ČÍSLA OD LETECKEJ SPOLOČNOSTI EŠTE PRED VYPLNENÍM NÁŠHO FORMULÁRA O STRATENEJ BATOŽINE.

data.name: MBR_WhenFilled
data.value: Keď nahlásite u leteckej spoločnosti stratu batožiny, získate referenčné číslo, a číslo štítku, ktoré tu zadáte:

data.name: ContactUs_BRBTeam
data.value: Blue Ribbon Bags Customer Service Team

data.name: ContactUs_Text1
data.value: All inquiries will be answered by email as soon as possible. Please make sure to include all of your contact information, including phone numbers, so we can contact you by phone if necessary.

data.name: ContactUs_Text2
data.value: For customers or general questions please contact us at:

data.name: ContactUs_Text3
data.value: For travel agents, please contact us at:

data.name: LPP_Text1
data.value: Blue Ribbon Bags (BRB), provides a unique service that tracks and expedites the recovery of a passenger's mishandled luggage for the first 96 hours of it being undelivered. If Blue Ribbon Bags cannot facilitate the return of the passenger's luggage in that time, BRB will send the Satisfaction Guarantee Payment to the passenger. Payments are guaranteed, even if the bag is returned to the customer AT ANY POINT after the 96 hour period has elapsed.

data.name: LPP_Subtitle2
data.value: What do I do if my bag goes missing?

data.name: LPP_Subtitle3
data.value: How do I know if I qualify for payment?

data.name: LPP_Subtitle1
data.value: Is there anything else I should be aware of?

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item1
data.value: ONE PURCHASE (US$5) COVERS ALL BAGGAGE CHECKED AT THE AIRPORT, INCLUDING BAGGAGE CHECKED AT THE GATE AT THE LAST MINUTE BEFORE YOUR FLIGHT.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item10
data.value: AUTOMATIC EMAIL NOTIFICATIONS WILL BE SENT TO THE PASSENGER EVERY TIME THERE IS A CHANGE TO THE STATUS OF THEIR BAGS. PASSENGERS DO NOT NEED TO CONTACT THE AIRLINE TO KNOW THE STATUS OF THEIR LUGGAGE.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item11
data.value: PROOF OF BAGGAGE CONTENTS VALUE (RECEIPTS) IS NOT REQUIRED TO RECEIVE PAYMENT.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item12
data.value: PAYOUTS ARE LIMITED TO 2 UNDELIVERED BAGS PER PERSON.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item13
data.value: PAYMENTS ARE GUARANTEED, EVEN IF YOUR BAGS SHOW UP AT ANY POINT AFTER THE 96 HOUR DEADLINE.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item14
data.value: THEFT, MISSING CONTENTS, OR DAMAGED BAGGAGE ARE NOT INCLUDED IN THIS SERVICE. COVERAGE APPLIES TO BAGGAGE MISHANDLED BY THE AIRLINE ONLY. UNDELIVERED BAGS MUST BE REPORTED WITHIN 24 HOURS OF FLIGHT ARRIVAL.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item15
data.value: BRB SELLS A SERVICE. HAVING A BRB SERVICE AGREEMENT IS IN ADDITION TO ANY INSURANCE YOU MAY HAVE, NOT INSTEAD OF. AFTER COLLECTING YOUR BRB CHECK, YOU ARE STILL ABLE TO ACCEPT INSURANCE PAYOUTS.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item16
data.value: THE BLUE RIBBON BAGS SERVICE IS NON-REFUNDABLE OR TRANSFERABLE. NO REFUNDS OR CREDITS WILL BE ISSUED. IF YOUR FLIGHT IS CANCELLED AND A NEW FLIGHT IS BOOKED IN ITS PLACE, YOU MUST EITHER INFORM US OF THE CHANGE PRIOR TO YOUR NEW FLIGHT'S DEPARTURE OR PURCHASE A NEW SERVICE FOR YOUR NEW FLIGHT. ALL CHANGES MUST BE REPORTED TO BLUE RIBBON BAGS BY EMAILING US AT INFO@BLUERIBBONBAGS.COM, AND PLACING YOUR SERVICE AGREEMENT NUMBER IN THE SUBJECT LINE. YOU MUST LIST, IN THE BODY OF THE EMAIL, YOUR AIRLINE AND AIRLINE CONFIRMATION NUMBER, YOUR ORIGINAL FLIGHT NUMBER AND THE NEW FLIGHT NUMBER IS IT BEING CHANGED TO. IF THE AIRLINE IS CHANGING AS WELL, YOU MUST ALSO INFORM US OF THE NEW AIRLINE YOUR NEW FLIGHT IS ON.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item2
data.value: YOU MAY PURCHASE BLUE RIBBON BAGS SERVICE UP UNTIL THE MOMENT PRIOR TO YOUR FLIGHT'S DEPARTURE.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item3
data.value: EACH PURCHASE (US$5) IS PER PERSON, PER AIRLINE CONFIRMATION NUMBER, REGARDLESS OF THE NUMBER OF STOPOVERS OR CONNECTIONS ASSOCIATED WITH THAT AIRLINE CONFIRMATION NUMBER. ROUND TRIP TICKETS WITH A SINGLE AIRLINE CONFIRMATION NUMBER ARE COVERED WITH ONE PURCHASE.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item4
data.value: IF MULTIPLE FLIGHTS ARE BOOKED SEPARATELY AND ARE UNDER DIFFERENT AIRLINE CONFIRMATION NUMBERS, SEPARATE SERVICE AGREEMENTS WILL NEED TO BE PURCHASED FOR EACH FLIGHT.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item5
data.value: <u>AGENTS ONLY</u>: ONE PURCHASE (US$5) IS PER PERSON, PER PNR, REGARDLESS OF THE NUMBER OF CONNECTIONS OR STOPOVERS.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item6
data.value: BRB COVERS EVERY FLIGHT, ON EVERY AIRLINE, EVERYWHERE IN THE WORLD, REGARDLESS OF WHERE YOUR FLIGHT ORIGINATES FROM.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item7
data.value: A CLAIM MUST BE FILED WITH THE AIRLINE BEFORE REPORTING YOUR MISHANDLED BAG TO BLUE RIBBON BAGS.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item8
data.value: MISHANDLED BAGGAGE REPORTS CAN BE FILED ONLINE HERE OR BY PHONE AT (888) BAGGAGE (+1 888-224-4243), 24 HOURS A DAY, 7 DAYS A WEEK.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item9
data.value: UNDELIVERED BAGS MUST BE REPORTED WITHIN 24 HOURS OF FLIGHT ARRIVAL. BLUE RIBBON BAGS SERVICE WILL NOT BE HONORED FOR BAGS REPORTED AFTER THE 24 HOUR DEADLINE.

data.name: LPP_Missing_Item1
data.value: File a claim with your airline before contacting Blue Ribbon Bags.

data.name: LPP_Missing_Item2
data.value: File a Mishandled Baggage Report with Blue Ribbon Bags within 24 hours of your flight landing. Mishandled Baggage Report can be filed 24 hours a day, 7 days a week:

data.name: LPP_Missing_Item3
data.value:
Blue Ribbon Bags will begin its service of tracking and expediting your bag's return. The passenger will receive automatic email notifications every time there is a change to the status of their bags.
Passengers do not need to contact the airline to know the status of their bags.

data.name: LPP_Missing_Item4
data.value: Blue Ribbon Bags will either find your bag within 96 hours of the flight landing or will send you the guaranteed amount one minute after the 96 hour deadline expires.

data.name: LPP_Eligible_Item1
data.value: Your checked baggage does not arrive at your destination.

data.name: LPP_Eligible_Item2
data.value: You file a lost baggage claim with the airline on whose plane your baggage should have arrived and are given a file reference number or file locator number from the airline.

data.name: LPP_Eligible_Item3
data.value: You report a mishandled bag to Blue Ribbon Bags within 24 hours of your flight arrival.

data.name: LPP_Eligible_Item4
data.value: Your baggage is not returned to you within four (4) days of your flight arrival date, as documented by the airline.

data.name: PMBR_Features_Item1
data.value: Mishandled baggage reports may be filed 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, by clicking here or calling 888-BAGGAGE.

data.name: PMBR_Features_Item4
data.value: If the passenger indicates to the airline with which they have a claim, or to Blue Ribbon Bags, at any point, that their bag will be picked up as opposed to delivered, the baggage report status will be set to closed, and all bags will be considered returned, as soon as the bag arrives at the airport.

data.name: PMBR_Features_Item5
data.value: Once the bag arrives at the destination indicated to the airline when filing the claim the mishandled baggage report status will be set to closed.

data.name: PMBR_Search_Text
data.value: Automatic email notifications will be sent to the passenger every time there is a change to the status of their bags. Passengers do not need to contact the airline to know the status of their luggage.

data.name: PMBR_Text1
data.value:
Before reporting mishandled baggage to Blue Ribbon Bags, the passenger must file a lost baggage claim with their airline (as required by the rules of that airline).

UNDELIVERED BAGS, INCLUDING A VALID FILE REFERENCE NUMBER FROM THE AIRLINE, MUST BE REPORTED TO BLUE RIBBON BAGS WITHIN 24 HOURS OF FLIGHT ARRIVAL. BLUE RIBBON BAGS SERVICE WILL NOT BE HONORED FOR BAGS REPORTED AFTER THE 24 HOUR DEADLINE. IF THE AIRLINE HAS NOT PROVIDED YOU WITH A VALID FILE REFERENCE NUMBER, YOU WILL NEED TO CONTACT THE AIRLINE AND COLLECT IT FROM THEM BEFORE FILLING YOUR REPORT WITH US. BLUE RIBBON BAGS WILL NOT RETRIEVE FILE REFERENCE NUMBERS FROM THE AIRLINE. IT IS THE PASSENGER’S RESPONSIBILITY TO COLLECT THIS INFORMATION FROM THE AIRLINE BEFORE FILLING THEIR MISHANDLED BAGGAGE REPORT WITH US.

In the event that a delivered bag is discovered to not be the proper bag of the passenger, the passenger has 12 hours from being notified that their file with Blue Ribbon Bags is closed and a bag has been returned, to inform Blue Ribbon Bags of the error by emailing us at mbr@blueribbonbags.com and putting "Not my bag" and your MBR number in the subject line. Blue Ribbon Bags will have 72 hours (3 days) from the expiration of the original 96 hours from when the passenger’s original flight landed, to locate the misdirected bag. Any bag that falls into this category will be considered "returned" per our terms and conditions once that bag reaches the airport on record with the airline lost luggage claim. If the wrong bag has already been delivered, passenger will need to provide email proof of a delivery receipt from the delivery company that delivered the wrong bag, as well as documentation from the airline clearly stating that the referenced bag which was returned to the passenger was not theirs. Both of these pieces of documentation will be required to collect the Blue Ribbon Bags satisfaction guaranteed payment.

MISINFORMATION OR INFORMATION REQUESTS: If the wrong information is provided when filing a mishandled baggage report, you may receive an email asking for that information to be corrected. In the event that a passenger receives an email of this nature, or any other requests for information regarding the passenger's case, the passenger will have 12 hours from the time of that email being sent to reply. If the passenger does not reply in that time period with the corrected or requested information, and any supporting documentation requested, the passenger's Mishandled Baggage Report will be denied, and the passenger will no longer qualify for baggage retrieval services or our satisfaction guaranteed payment.

If a delivery address was NOT provided to the airline when filing an airline lost baggage claim, BRB will close your case once the bag arrives at the designated airport on record with the airline, and your bags will be considered returned per the Blue Ribbon Bags Service Agreement.

NOTE: If the passenger's bag was mishandled by an airline that only issues (PIR) Property irregularity Reports (this is the title of the report the airline provides the passenger with their file reference number on it) by the airline or through the airport, or a baggage irregularity report (BIR) via the airline, (BIRs generally do not provide a ten digit file reference number), the passenger must send a copy of their Property Irregularity Report, or Baggage Irregularity Report to mbr@blueribbonbags.com by putting their Service Agreement number in the subject line, after completing the online form. We must receive a copy of this report within 24 hours of the passenger's flight landing for their report to be considered valid. If a copy of this report is not provided within 24 hours of your flight landing, BRB will deny the passenger's report immediately upon expiration of the 24 hour deadline. Any bag within this category will be considered "returned" per our terms and conditions once it arrives at the airport on record with the flight itinerary or forwarding information provided to the airline by the customer when filing your lost baggage claim with the airline.

NOTE: If your bag was mishandled by an airline that only issues property irregularity reports (PIR) through the airport (lost snd found), or a baggage irregularity report (BIR) via the airline, (BIRs generally do not provide a ten digit file reference number), Blue Ribbon Bags will only issue our satisfaction guaranteed payment for a bag mishandled for more than 96 hours, after the airline has issued payment (compensation) for that lost bag, first. If the airline never issues the passenger compensation for a lost bag, neither will Blue Ribbon Bags. In either of these instances, proof of payment from the airline will be required to collect the satisfaction guaranteed payment from Blue Ribbon Bags, in addition to an acknowledgement from the airline that the payment issued by them was for the referenced lost bag. Blue Ribbon Bags will assist in the locating of your undelivered luggage as normal for the first 96 hours of the bags being mishandled.

ERRORS: In the event that an error is discovered by the passenger when Blue Ribbon Bags has denied your Mishandled Baggage Report or Closed your Mishandled Baggage Report, the passenger has 12 hours from receipt of the email informing them of either of these circumstances, to report the error to Blue Ribbon Bags. Please inform us of the error by emailing us at mbr@BlueRibbonBags.com, and putting your MBR number in the subject line. The passenger must explain within the email exactly what the error was in as much detail as possible, and provide any supporting documentation. In the event that Blue Ribbon Bags discovers the error to be valid, Blue Ribbon Bags will have 72 hours from the time their passenger’s file is reopened, to locate the passenger’s luggage. If the 96 hour time frame from when the passenger’s original flight landed expires after the 72 hour window from when the file is reopened, Blue Ribbon Bags will have until the original 96 hours has expired to locate the passenger’s luggage. In either case, once the passenger’s baggage is received at the airport on file with the airline lost luggage claim, the baggage will be considered returned, per the Blue Ribbon Bags terms and conditions, and the passenger’s file will be closed.

All submissions received after the 12 hour time period will not be accepted, and the passenger will not qualify for baggage retrieval services or our satisfaction guaranteed payment, regardless of any documentation submitted.

data.name: PMBR_Title_Search
data.value: Search for your Mishandled Baggage Report

data.name: SPP_BRB_Features_Item01
data.value: For the first 96 hours, BRB will work directly with the airline to track your mishandled bags, and expedite their return. Rather than you having to spend your trip on the phone with the airline, BRB will send you an automatic update every time there is a change to the status of your bag.

data.name: SPP_BRB_Features_Item02
data.value: One purchase ($5) is per person, per airline confirmation number, including round-trip tickets, regardless of the number of connections. payouts ($1000) are per bag

data.name: SPP_BRB_Features_Item03
data.value: No proof of bag contents is required to receive payment.

data.name: SPP_BRB_Features_Item04
data.value: Payment is issued if your bag is not in your hand within 96 hours of your flight's arrival. Payments are guaranteed, even if your bag is returned to you at any point after the 96 hour deadline.

data.name: SPP_BRB_Features_Item05
data.value: BRB sells a service, having a BRB service agreement is in addition to any insurance you may have. After a collecting a BRB check, you are still able to accept an insurance payout.

data.name: SPP_BRB_Features_Item06
data.value: A claim must be filed with the airline before reporting your mishandled bag to Blue Ribbon Bags. Undelivered bags must be reported to BRB within 24 hours of filing airline lost baggage.

data.name: SPP_BRB_Features_Item07
data.value: Mishandled bag reports are filed simply by going to www.blueribbonbags.com, or by calling (888)-BAGGAGE 24/7

data.name: SPP_BRB_Features_Item08
data.value: One service agreement ($5) includes all bags checked at airport, including last minute gate check-ins. Higher coverage options are available for $7.50 & $10.00, receiving payment of $1500 and $2000.

data.name: SPP_BRB_Features_Item09
data.value: Blue Ribbon Bags covers every flight everywhere in the world

data.name: SPP_BRB_Features_Item10
data.value: YOU MAY PURCHASE THE BLUE RIBBON BAGS SERVICE UP TO THE MOMENT PRIOR TO YOUR FLIGHT'S DEPARTURE.

data.name: SPP_BRB_Features_Item11
data.value: You must purchase the Blue Ribbon Bags service prior to all flights within your outbound or inbound trip. You may not purchase the service while in between legs of a journey (i.e. while in between connections).

data.name: SPP_BRB_Features_Item12
data.value: THE BLUE RIBBON BAGS SERVICE IS NON-REFUNDABLE OR TRANSFERABLE. NO REFUNDS OR CREDITS WILL BE ISSUED. IF YOUR FLIGHT IS CANCELLED AND A NEW FLIGHT IS BOOKED IN ITS PLACE, YOU MUST EITHER INFORM US OF THE CHANGE PRIOR TO YOUR NEW FLIGHT'S DEPARTURE OR PURCHASE A NEW SERVICE FOR YOUR NEW FLIGHT. ALL CHANGES MUST BE REPORTED TO BLUE RIBBON BAGS BY EMAILING US AT INFO@BLUERIBBONBAGS.COM, AND PLACING YOUR SERVICE AGREEMENT NUMBER IN THE SUBJECT LINE. YOU MUST LIST, IN THE BODY OF THE EMAIL, YOUR AIRLINE AND AIRLINE CONFIRMATION NUMBER, YOUR ORIGINAL FLIGHT NUMBER AND THE NEW FLIGHT NUMBER IS IT BEING CHANGED TO. IF THE AIRLINE IS CHANGING AS WELL, YOU MUST ALSO INFORM US OF THE NEW AIRLINE YOUR NEW FLIGHT IS ON.

data.name: SPP_BRB_Features_Text
data.value: All purchases are subject to the terms and conditions of the Blue Ribbon Bags Service Agreement. It can be viewed here.

data.name: SPP_FAQ_A1
data.value: A mishandled bag is a checked bag that the airline's tracking system reveals has been misdirected to a destination different from that of your flight's end-point destination, or that has not been loaded onto the flights which the passenger has taken, as reported by the airline.

data.name: SPP_FAQ_A2
data.value: Each purchase is per person per Airline Confirmation Number. If a round trip ticket, regardless of how many stopovers, is booked under one airline confirmation number it will be covered under one purchase. If your outbound and inbound flight are booked under different airline confirmation numbers, separate service agreements will need to be purchased for each flight.

data.name: SPP_FAQ_A3
data.value: No! Blue Ribbon Bags covers every flight everywhere in the world. There are no restrictions as to origination or ending location.

data.name: SPP_FAQ_Q2
data.value: Does this service cover round trip tickets?

data.name: SPP_FAQ_Q3
data.value: Does my flight have to originate or end in the United States to purchase this service?

data.name: SPP_Review_License_Text
data.value: Click here to review the Blue Ribbon Bags Service Agreement

data.name: SPP_Text
data.value: For only $5.00 per person, BRB will locate and return all of your mishandled bags. If the airline has not delivered your bags to you within 96 hours of them going missing, BRB pays $1,000 for each bag not delivered, guaranteed; <u>no proof or receipts for baggage contents are required to receive payment</u>.

data.name: PMBR_Result_Incorrect_Info_Text
data.value: * If any information above is incorrect, please email us at mbr@blueribbonbags.com

data.name: PMBR_Result_Report_Status
data.value: The status of this mishandled baggage report is:

data.name: PMBR_Result_Status
data.value: It has been open for {0} days.

data.name: PMBR_Result_Status_Payment
data.value: Mishandled baggage report will be paid to:   {0}

data.name: PMBR_Result_Status_Remain
data.value: It will result in payment if it is still open in {0} days.

data.name: PA_Text_1
data.value:
Thank you very much for choosing Blue Ribbon Bags for your upcoming trip. Be assured, we will make this as simple as possible for you.

Your Blue Ribbon Bags Service Agreement number is

data.name: PA_Text_2
data.value: Please keep this service agreement number for your records as you will need it to report your mishandled bag to us in the event your baggage is not delivered.

data.name: PA_Text_3
data.value: You will be receiving a confirmation email from Blue Ribbon Bags in a couple of minutes. In case you do not receive it please contact us and keep your Paypal transaction confirmation on hand.

data.name: PA_Text_4
data.value:
What to do if your bag does not arrive:
If your bag does not accompany you to your flight's end-point destination you must report it to the airline before reporting it to Blue Ribbon Bags. Undelivered bags must be reported to Blue Ribbon Bags within 24 hours of your flight landing. You may report the mishandled bag to us either by phone at {0}, or online at {2}, 24 hours a day, 7 days week.

Please be sure to retain the baggage tracking information (file reference/locator number) the airline provides you with when filing a lost baggage claim with them, as Blue Ribbon Bags will require this information to process your mishandled baggage report. Undelivered bags must be reported to Blue Ribbon Bags within 24 hours of your flight landing.

Your payment information appears below. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact Blue Ribbon Bags by sending an email at info@BlueRibbonBags.com. We are here to help you 24/7 seven days a week. Travel safe and worry free!

Your Service Agreement is available online at {4}.

Thank you very much for your business and safe travels.

THE BLUE RIBBON BAGS SERVICE IS NON-REFUNDABLE OR TRANSFERABLE. NO REFUNDS OR CREDITS WILL BE ISSUED. IF YOUR FLIGHT IS CANCELLED AND A NEW FLIGHT IS BOOKED IN ITS PLACE, YOU MUST EITHER INFORM US OF THE CHANGE PRIOR TO YOUR NEW FLIGHT'S DEPARTURE OR PURCHASE A NEW SERVICE FOR YOUR NEW FLIGHT. ALL CHANGES MUST BE REPORTED TO BLUE RIBBON BAGS BY EMAILING US AT INFO@BLUERIBBONBAGS.COM, AND PLACING YOUR SERVICE AGREEMENT NUMBER IN THE SUBJECT LINE. YOU MUST LIST, IN THE BODY OF THE EMAIL, YOUR AIRLINE AND AIRLINE CONFIRMATION NUMBER, YOUR ORIGINAL FLIGHT NUMBER AND THE NEW FLIGHT NUMBER IS IT BEING CHANGED TO. IF THE AIRLINE IS CHANGING AS WELL, YOU MUST ALSO INFORM US OF THE NEW AIRLINE YOUR NEW FLIGHT IS ON.

data.name: MBR_InfoNote
data.value: Ak cestujúci opustí toto miesto určenia v rámci 96-hodinovej lehoty a chce o tejto okolnosti informovať BRB, aby bolo možné zabezpečiť správne doručenie batožiny, zašlite nám e-mail nambr@blueribbonbags.com, a vložte číslo MBR, ktoré vám bolo poskytnuté pri vyplňovaní vašej správy v riadku predmetu a poskytnite nám čo najviac podrobností o vašej situácii.

data.name: Note
data.value: IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO PROVIDE ANY INFORMATION PERTAINING TO YOUR BAG OR DELIVERY INFORMATION PLEASE ENTER IT HERE.

data.name: LPP_Feat_Item51
data.value: FOR PURCHASES MADE THROUGH ONLINE TICKETING WEBSITES: EACH PURCHASE IS PER THE ITINERARY BOOKED THROUGH THE ONLINE WEBSITE, WHICH WILL BE LISTED UNDER THE CONFIRMATION NUMBER PROVIDED BY THAT WEBSITE AT THE TIME OF PURCHASE. ANY CHANGES TO THE ITINERARY OCCURRING OUTSIDE OF THE WEB BOOKING WILL REQUIRE A SEPARATE SERVICE TO BE PURCHASED FOR ANY NEW FLIGHTS BOOKED. IF THE CHANGE TO THE ITINERARY IS DONE THROUGH THE WEBSITE WITH WHICH THE ORIGINAL ITINERARY WAS BOOKED, AND THE PASSENGER’S CONFIRMATION NUMBER FOR THE ORIGINAL ITINERARY IS UNCHANGED AFTER CHANGING ANY FLIGHTS WITHIN THE ITINERARY, THE PASSENGER WILL NOT REQUIRE A SEPARATE SERVICE TO BE BOOKED, AND THE ORIGINAL SERVICE WILL BE SUFFICIENT.

data.name: PasswordReq
data.value:
The password field is intentionally shown as blank. If you wish to provide a new password, please provide a new password and confirm your new password.

The password must contain at least 8 (eight) characters with at least one alphabetic, one numeric value and one special character with at least one of the alphabetic characters capitalized.

The allowable special characters include: ! @ # $ % & * ( ) _ - + =

data.value: This is a PDF that you can use for reference when talking to your clients, so you don't miss any of the great features of BRB!

data.name: ContactUs_TextFileMBR
data.value:
To file a new Mishandled Baggage Reports call +1 (888) BAGGAGE (+1 (888) 224-4243) or visit
https://www.blueribbonbags.com/MbrFilingPassenger. Note: this number will not have detail on any existing baggage reports.

data.name: ContactUs_TextForDetails
data.value: For any detail on any existing Mishandled Baggage Reports please visit https://www.blueribbonbags.com/MishandledBaggageReports or email mbr@blueribbonbags.com with your MBR# in the subject line.

ALL CHANGES MUST BE REPORTED TO BLUE RIBBON BAGS BY EMAILING US AT INFO@BLUERIBBONBAGS.COM, AND PLACING YOUR SERVICE AGREEMENT NUMBER IN THE SUBJECT LINE. YOU MUST LIST, IN THE BODY OF THE EMAIL, YOUR AIRLINE AND AIRLINE CONFIRMATION NUMBER, YOUR ORIGINAL FLIGHT NUMBER AND THE NEW FLIGHT NUMBER IS IT BEING CHANGED TO. data.name: WORLDSPAN_AgentWarning
data.value:
Please make sure to fully complete this form the first time you use the Blue Ribbon Bags Worldspan App in order to receive proper credit for the Service Agreements that you have sold.

When you have finished please click Save at the bottom to move on to purchasing Blue Ribbon Bags coverage on behalf of your clients.

You will not need to create a password or use your login to access the BRB Worldspan app. Logins and passwords are only used to access the BRB system online.

To change any registration information or for any questions or issues, please email us at agent@blueribbonbags.com

data.name: GoBack_Description
data.value: * You can edit your information by clicking the “Go Back” button without having to reenter your previous information

data.name: EMAILTEMPLATE_DateRangeCoverage
data.value: This covers all of your flight(s) taken from {0}-{1}

data.name: EMAILTEMPLATE_FlightCoverage
data.value: Služba sledovania batožiny sa týka Vašej cesty leteckou spoločnosťou {0} s číslom rezervácie: {1}

data.name: EMAILTEMPLATE_NonRefundable
data.value: Servisný poplatok je nevratný a samotnú službu nie je možné previesť na iného cestujúceho. Ak Váš let zrušili a rezervovali ste si nový let, informujte nás o tom alebo si opäť kúpte službu. Všetky zmeny oznámte na adresu: INFO@BLUERIBBONBAGS.COM, pričom v téme správy uveďte svoje servisné číslo. V obsahu správy uveďte informáciu o názve leteckej spoločnosti, číslo rezervácie, číslo zrušeného letu a aktuálne číslo letu. Tento postup sa týka aj zmien uskutočnených leteckou spoločnosťou.

data.name: PMBR_ClosedText
data.value: All Bags have been located and this case is closed

data.name: Product_BRONZE_Legend
data.value: (*) The bronze service level is for Domestic India Travel ONLY. Any bookings made with the bronze service level that include any flights within the itinerary that are international flights coming to or leaving from India or any other country will not be honored.

data.name: AskAboutBillMeLater
data.value: Ask us about Bill Me Later. That way you won’t need to put payments through on every transaction, and can receive one invoice net of your commissions at the end of every month! Simply email agent@blueribbonbags.com, and put “Bill Me Later” in the subject line.

data.name: PMBR_Text1_New
data.value:
• OUR PHONE NUMBER (888-BAGGAGE) IS ONLY FOR THE PURPOSE OF RECEIVING NEW MISHANDLED BAGGAGE REPORTS. THIS PHONE NUMBER WILL NOT HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING EXISTING MISHANDLED BAGGAGE REPORTS. ANY QUESTIONS OR COMMENTS OR SUBMISSIONS OF INFORMATION, CONCERNING EXISTING MISHANDLED BAGGAGE REPORTS, WHETHER NEW, OPEN, MISINFORMATION, OR CLOSED, FOR ANY REASON, SHOULD BE SENT, BY EMAIL, TO MBR@BLUERIBBONBAGS.COM, AND PLACE YOUR SERVICE AGREEMENT NUMBER IN THE SUBJECT LINE
  • Before reporting mishandled baggage to Blue Ribbon Bags, the passenger must file a lost baggage claim with their airline (as required by the rules of that airline).
  • UNDELIVERED BAGS, INCLUDING A VALID FILE REFERENCE NUMBER FROM THE AIRLINE, MUST BE REPORTED TO BLUE RIBBON BAGS WITHIN 24 HOURS OF FLIGHT ARRIVAL. BLUE RIBBON BAGS SERVICE WILL NOT BE HONORED FOR BAGS REPORTED AFTER THE 24 HOUR DEADLINE. IF THE AIRLINE HAS NOT PROVIDED YOU WITH A VALID FILE REFERENCE NUMBER, YOU WILL NEED TO CONTACT THE AIRLINE AND COLLECT IT FROM THEM BEFORE FILING YOUR REPORT WITH US. BLUE RIBBON BAGS WILL NOT RETRIEVE FILE REFERENCE NUMBERS FROM THE AIRLINE. IT IS THE PASSENGER’S RESPONSIBILITY TO COLLECT THIS INFORMATION FROM THE AIRLINE BEFORE FILING THEIR MISHANDLED BAGGAGE REPORT WITH US.
  • For ALL Flights which have arrived outside of the United States: As part of the Mishandled Baggage Report filing process you are required to submit a copy of the report the airline provided you with, when you filed your lost luggage claim, to Blue Ribbon Bags within 24 hours of your flight landing. If you do not submit a copy of this report, as provided to you by the airline when filing your lost luggage claim, within 24 hours of your flight landing, your Mishandled Baggage Report with Blue Ribbon Bags will be denied immediately upon expiration of the 24 hour deadline, and you will not qualify for baggage retrieval services or our Satisfaction Guaranteed Payment. Please send a copy of your report to mbr@blueribbonbags.com and put your Service Agreement number in the subject line. Airline Reports which are submitted in any other manner then as instructed above will not be considered a valid submission. Any bag within this category will be considered "returned" per the terms and conditions of the Blue Ribbon Bags Service Agreement, once the bag arrives at the airport on record in your lost baggage claim with the airline.
    For Flights which have arrived within the United States: If your bag was mishandled by an airline that provided you with a Property irregularity Report (PIR), (this is the title of the report the airline gave you when you filed your lost luggage claim that has your file reference number on it, by the airline or through the airport) or a baggage irregularity report (BIR) via the airline, (BIRs generally do not provide a ten digit file reference number), you are required to submit a copy of your Property Irregularity Report, or Baggage Irregularity Report to Blue Ribbon Bags within 24 hours of your flight landing in order to complete the Mishandled Baggage Report filing process. If you do not submit a copy of this report, as provided to you by the airline, within 24 hours of your flight landing, your Mishandled Baggage Report with Blue Ribbon Bags will be denied immediately upon expiration of the 24 hour deadline, and you will not qualify for baggage retrieval services or our Satisfaction Guaranteed Payment. Please submit a copy of this report to mbr@blueribbonbags.com and put your Service Agreement number in the subject line. Airline Reports which are submitted in any other manner then as instructed above will not be considered a valid submission. Any bag within this category will be considered "returned" per the terms and conditions of the Blue Ribbon Bags Service Agreement, once the bag arrives at the airport on record in your lost baggage claim with the airline.
  • In the event that a delivered bag is discovered to not be the proper bag of the passenger, the passenger has 12 hours from being notified that their file with Blue Ribbon Bags is closed and a bag has been returned, to inform Blue Ribbon Bags of the error by emailing us at mbr@blueribbonbags.com and putting "Not my bag" and your MBR number in the subject line. Blue Ribbon Bags will have 72 hours (3 days) from the expiration of the original 96 hours from when the passenger’s original flight landed, to locate the misdirected bag. Any bag that falls into this category will be considered 'returned' per our terms and conditions once that bag reaches the airport on record with the airline lost luggage claim. If the wrong bag has already been delivered, passenger will need to provide email proof of a delivery receipt from the delivery company that delivered the wrong bag, as well as documentation from the airline clearly stating that the referenced bag which was returned to the passenger was not theirs. Both of these pieces of documentation will be required to collect the Blue Ribbon Bags satisfaction guaranteed payment.
  • MISINFORMATION OR INFORMATION REQUESTS: If the wrong information is provided when filing a mishandled baggage report, you may receive an email asking for that information to be corrected. In the event that a passenger receives an email of this nature, or any other requests for information regarding the passenger's case, the passenger will have 12 hours from the time of that email being sent to reply. If the passenger does not reply in that time period with the corrected or requested information, and any supporting documentation requested, the passenger's Mishandled Baggage Report will be denied, and the passenger will no longer qualify for baggage retrieval services or our satisfaction guaranteed payment.
  • If a delivery address was NOT provided to the airline when filing an airline lost baggage claim, BRB will close your case once the bag arrives at the designated airport on record with the airline, and your bags will be considered returned per the Blue Ribbon Bags Service Agreement.
  • AIR CANADA AND WESTJET PASSENGERS: Blue Ribbon Bags will not handle delivery of lost luggage to the passenger for Mishandled Baggage Reports associated with claims from either of these two airlines. Any mishandled bags associated with an Air Canada or WestJet airlines lost luggage claim will be considered “returned” per the terms and conditions of the Blue Ribbon Bags Service Agreement once the bag arrives at the airport on record with the Air Canada or WestJet lost luggage claim. Once bags are confirmed arrived at the airport on record with the Air Canada or WestJet lost luggage claim within the service period, passenger will no longer qualify for baggage retrieval services or the Blue Ribbon Bags Satisfaction guaranteed payment.
  • ERRORS: In the event that an error is discovered by the passenger when Blue Ribbon Bags has denied your Mishandled Baggage Report or Closed your Mishandled Baggage Report, the passenger has 12 hours from receipt of the email informing them of either of these circumstances, to report the error to Blue Ribbon Bags. Please inform us of the error by emailing us at mbr@BlueRibbonBags.com, and putting your MBR number in the subject line. The passenger must explain within the email exactly what the error was in as much detail as possible, and provide any supporting documentation. In the event that Blue Ribbon Bags discovers the error to be valid, Blue Ribbon Bags will have 72 hours from the time their passenger’s file is reopened, to locate the passenger’s luggage. If the 96 hour time frame from when the passenger’s original flight landed expires after the 72 hour window from when the file is reopened, Blue Ribbon Bags will have until the original 96 hours has expired to locate the passenger’s luggage. In either case, once the passenger’s baggage is received at the airport on file with the airline lost luggage claim, the baggage will be considered returned, per the Blue Ribbon Bags terms and conditions, and the passenger’s file will be closed. All submissions received after the 12 hour time period will not be accepted, and the passenger will not qualify for baggage retrieval services or our satisfaction guaranteed payment, regardless of any documentation submitted.
  • THEFT, MISSING CONTENTS, OR DAMAGED BAGGAGE ARE NOT INCLUDED IN THIS SERVICE. COVERAGE APPLIES TO BAGGAGE MISHANDLED BY THE AIRLINE, ONLY.

data.name: SF_Feature_01
data.value: Blue Ribbon Bags will track and expedite the return of your delayed baggage for 96 hours from the time your flight lands.

data.name: SF_Feature_02
data.value: You will receive automatic email updates every time there is any change to the status of your mishandled bag.

data.name: SF_Feature_03
data.value: One Service Agreement includes all bags checked at airport, including last minute gate check-ins.

data.name: SF_Feature_04
data.value: Blue Ribbon Bags service covers every flight, on every airline, everywhere in the world.

data.name: SF_Feature_05
data.value: Each purchase is per person, per airline confirmation number, regardless of the number of connections.

data.name: SF_Feature_06
data.value: You can purchase our service right up until the moment prior to your flight’s departure.

data.name: SF_Feature_07
data.value: Our service must be purchased prior to all flights within an inbound or outbound itinerary. Our service cannot be purchased “mid-connection”.

data.name: SF_Feature_08
data.value: A claim must be filed with your airline prior to reporting your mishandled bag to us.

data.name: SF_Feature_09
data.value: Mishandled bags must be reported to us within 24 hours of your flight arrival.

data.name: SF_Feature_10
data.value: No proof of baggage contents is required to receive our Satisfaction Guarantee Payment.

data.name: SF_Feature_11
data.value: Payment is issued if your bag is not found within 96 hours (4-days) of your flight arrival.

data.name: SF_Feature_12
data.value: Payments are guaranteed even if your bags are returned after the 96-hour service period.

data.name: SF_Feature_13
data.value: BRB sells a service that is in addition to any insurance you may have, and not instead of.

data.name: HM_IX_Sentence_01
data.value: FOR ONLY $5.00, </br>BRB WILL TRACK AND EXPEDITE THE RETURN OF YOUR UNDELIVERED BAGGAGE </br>BY THE AIRLINE.

data.name: HM_IX_Sentence_03
data.value:
IF YOUR LUGGAGE IS NOT FOUND
AFTER 96 HOURS
BRB WILL SEND YOU $1000, PER BAG, GUARANTEED.

data.name: HM_IX_Sentence_04
data.value:
True Peace of Mind
Is Blue Peace of Mind

data.name: HM_IX_Sentence_06
data.value: Remember to first notify the airline that your baggage did not arrive at your flight’s end-point. The airline will provide the tracking information needed to file a report with Blue Ribbon Bags. All missing baggage must be reported to Blue Ribbon Bags within 24 hours of passenger’s flight landing.

data.name: HM_IX_Sentence_08
data.value: You can also Report your Missing Baggage by phone at 888-BAGGAGE (888-224-4243) 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

data.name: SF_SF_Feature_01b
data.value: We send you email updates every time there is a change to the status of your lost luggage

data.name: SF_SF_Feature_02b
data.value: Receipts for lost baggage contents NOT required to receive payment

data.name: SF_SF_Feature_03b
data.value: One purchase covers all baggage checked at the airport

data.name: SF_SF_Feature_04b
data.value: BRB pays $1,000 guaranteed, for each bag not found after 4 days missing

data.name: SF_SF_Feature_05b
data.value: BRB covers every flight, on every airline, everywhere in the world

data.name: SF_SF_Feature_06b
data.value: Purchase baggage service up until moment prior to flight’s departure

data.name: PMBR_Text0
data.value: OUR PHONE NUMBER (888-BAGGAGE) IS ONLY FOR THE PURPOSE OF RECEIVING NEW MISHANDLED BAGGAGE REPORTS. THIS PHONE NUMBER WILL NOT HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING EXISTING MISHANDLED BAGGAGE REPORTS. ANY QUESTIONS OR COMMENTS OR SUBMISSIONS OF INFORMATION, CONCERNING EXISTING MISHANDLED BAGGAGE REPORTS, WHETHER NEW, OPEN, MISINFORMATION, OR CLOSED, FOR ANY REASON, SHOULD BE SENT, BY EMAIL, TO MBR@BLUERIBBONBAGS.COM, AND PLACE YOUR SERVICE AGREEMENT NUMBER IN THE SUBJECT LINE

data.name: ContactUs_Include
data.value: All inquiries will be answered by email as soon as possible. Please make sure to include all of your contact information, including phone numbers, so we can contact you by phone if neccessary.

data.name: PMBR_Title_01
data.value: IMPORTANT INFORMATION ABOUT MISHANDLED BAGGAGE REPORTS

data.name: Service_TemplateXlsx_1
data.value: Upload an excel file with data for create services attached to them. Click on

data.name: MBR_Email_WrongFileReferenceNumberText
data.value:
Zadané referenčné číslo zložky nie je platné.  Musíte kontaktovať svoju leteckú spoločnosť a požiadať ich, aby vám okamžite dali platné referenčné číslo.  Aby bolo možné vašu žiadosť spracovať, toto číslo nám musí byť dodané do 24 hodín od pristátia vášho letu.  Blue Ribbon Bags nezískava referenčné čísla menom pasažiera.
Získanie týchto informácií od leteckej spoločnosti a jej predloženie do 24 hodín od pristátia letu je zodpovednosťou pasažiera.  Ak nedostaneme platné referenčné číslo do 24 hodín od pristátia vášho letu, vaša správa bude zamietnutá a nebudete mať nárok na službu vrátenie batožinu alebo naši platbu záruky spokojnosti.  Vaši zložku neotvoríme znova, bez ohľadu na okolnosti, ak bude táto informácia odovzdaná 24 hodín po pristátí vášho letu.
Ak ste nám už predložili kópiu Vášho prehľadu, ktorý vám poskytla letecká spoločnosť, keď ste podali žiadosť o strate batožiny a stále dostávate tento e-mail, znamená to, že letecká spoločnosť vám neposkytla platné referenčné číslo súboru a musíte ich kontaktovať, aby ste ich ihneď vyzdvihli a poskytli nám ich do 24 hodín po pristátí vášho letu.

data.name: EMAILTEMPLATE_NonRefundable_Falabella
data.value: THE BLUE RIBBON BAGS SERVICE IS NON-TRANSFERABLE. NO REFUNDS OR CREDITS WILL BE ISSUED. IF YOUR FLIGHT IS CANCELLED AND A NEW FLIGHT IS BOOKED IN ITS PLACE, YOU MUST EITHER INFORM US OF THE CHANGE PRIOR TO YOUR NEW FLIGHT'S DEPARTURE OR PURCHASE A NEW SERVICE FOR YOUR NEW FLIGHT. ALL CHANGES MUST BE REPORTED TO BLUE RIBBON BAGS BY EMAILING US AT INFO@BLUERIBBONBAGS.COM, AND PLACING YOUR SERVICE AGREEMENT NUMBER IN THE SUBJECT LINE. YOU MUST LIST, IN THE BODY OF THE EMAIL, YOUR AIRLINE AND AIRLINE CONFIRMATION NUMBER, YOUR ORIGINAL FLIGHT NUMBER AND THE NEW FLIGHT NUMBER IS IT BEING CHANGED TO. IF THE AIRLINE IS CHANGING AS WELL, YOU MUST ALSO INFORM US OF THE NEW AIRLINE YOUR NEW FLIGHT IS ON.

data.name: SMS_MBR_Template
data.value: BLUE RIBBON BAGS-MBR #{0}: There is an update to the status of your lost baggage. The update is: {1}. PLEASE DO NOT RESPOND TO THIS TEXT MESSAGE, AS IT WILL NOT BE RECEIVED BY BLUE RIBBON BAGS, THIS INCLUDES ANY SUBMISSIONS OF INFORMATION REQUESTED IN THIS UPDATE. ALL QUESTIONS REGARDING YOUR MISHANDLED BAGGAGE REPORT OR SUBMISSIONS OF REQUESTED INFORMATION SHOULD BE SENT VIA EMAIL TO MBR@BLUERIBBONBAGS.COM. Our phone numbers will not have any information regarding your lost baggage. All correspondences are done via email at mbr@blueribbonbags.com

data.name: MBR_PaymentDetailsChanged
data.value: Poznámka: Platobné údaje možno po podaní správy zmeniť. To môže viesť k miernemu oneskoreniu so spracovaním platby.

data.value: Vyplňte informácie spojené s vaším účtom PayPal.

data.name: MBR_PleaseComplete
data.value: Vyplňte polia presne tak, ako sa uvádzajú vo vašom nároku s leteckou spoločnosťou.

data.name: MBR_PleaseEnter
data.value: Zadajte informácie o platbe. Toto je adresa, na ktorú by ste chceli, aby sa vaša platba odoslala v prípade, že batožina bola odložená na viac ako 96 hodín.

data.name: MBR_PleaseEnterPayPal
data.value: Zadajte informácie o platbe. Toto je miesto, kde by ste chceli, aby sa vaša platba odoslala v prípade, že batožina bola odložená na viac ako 96 hodín.

data.name: MBR_Provide
data.value: Uveďte nasledujúce informácie presne tak, ako sa to uvádza vo vašom nároku na stratu batožiny u leteckej spoločnosti. Toto je adresa, kde by ste chceli doručiť batožinu.

data.value: Pridajte do svojej správy kontaktné osoby

data.name: EMAIL_PRETEXT
data.value: V stave stavu vrecka sa nič nezmenilo za posledných 0 hodín. Tu je posledná aktualizácia, ktorú sme poskytli. Budete informovaní, či sa stane niečo nové, akonáhle budeme mať nejaké informácie.

data.name: MBR_Pir_Copy_Text
data.value: Pre dokončenie správy o zle doručenej batožine, je potrebné:
